# Language analysis

 * Catalog: `r catalog`
 * Field: `r field` 
 * Country: `r country`  
 * Entries: `r length(subdat[[field]])`
 * Unique entries for this field: `r length(unique(subdat[[field]]))`  


## Top languages by country

```{r top_lang, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
#Top languages per “national” context, histogram
#The Netherlands based on HPB (and STCN?)
#Austria based on HPB
#Estonia based on HPB
ntop <- 5
p <- top_plot(subdat[[field]], ntop = ntop) +
       labs(title = paste(catalog, field)) +
       scale_x_log10() +       
       theme_comhis("discrete")
print(p)
```
